Follow the Prime Minister's Statement All TV channels are now available. (The Prime Minister's Team)
What we try to do is tighten the cord. In order not to increase the number of protesters. The pressure to end the rally was minimal.
Officials have set up camps around the rally area. I do not have any space. But there are armed forces blocking the work of the authorities.
I want to confirm that what the government is doing is necessary. We can not let go of the condition that people can form forces to overthrow the government.
This is the only way to bring peace to the country. We try to use other means, such as negotiating a plan for reconciliation. Previously
If we desire to see the least loss. I need the assembly to end the rally. Because as long as there are congregations. Terrorists are still going on.
I have a friend from the public. No matter how you feel. Please do not bring yourself into a cycle of conflict. State officials will work on your behalf.
Thanks for all the encouragement and support. This has implications for security officers who are on a mission.
If not, do not go into the area. Because of the risk. Confusing And not safe
Let the brothers firmly. And to discern whether any news is factual, there is no evidence supporting me to interfere with the work of the media.
I would like to confirm that. What I and the staff are doing For the benefit of all people in the long term. I want to cooperate with you all.

wish everyone a great 17th of May! Are in Afghanistan with Norwegian soldiers. Thanks for the effort. Have had a good meeting with President Karzai.

In order to strengthen efforts towards domestic animal infectious diseases, "foot-and-mouth disease" occurring in Miyazaki prefecture, I first set up the "Foot and Mouth Disease Control Headquarters" with my head as head, and Mr. Masahiko Yamada Deputy Minister of Agriculture and Deputy Prime Minister Okawa Katsuya Has launched the local headquarters headed by the spearhead. We will do everything possible to ensure measures such as thorough anti-epidemic measures and support to farmers.
Norwegian soldiers in Afghanistan secure the values ​​we celebrate on 17 May. Read my entire speech here http://bit.ly/a3oGHx

Today, we invite Sihamoni King of Cambodia to the official residence and we will have an afternoon party. Speaking Cambodia is an Angkor monument. It seems that many Japanese who visited the shogen boat during the Edo period worshiped encore. Now, Japan is cooperating in conservation restoration activities. I feel the deep ties between the two countries through culture.

As the second project classification, we decided to carry out sorting of public benefit corporations following the independent administrative agencies from 20th to 26th this month. From 26th, we will also carry out "Public process of administrative business review" which should be called business classification at each ministry. I will work on cleaning the administration.
Again, I thank you all very much. I will answer some of the incoming questions, but not all.
There are many questions about Youtube. I am against the closure, but there is a judgment in this matter. I can not intervene in the judiciary as president.
I am very sorry for the dent in Zonguldak. I got information from the minister and the governor. I decided to go to Zonguldak. All preparations were completed.
However, when I stated that my visit might be interrupted, I stopped going to Zonguldak. My heart is with our workers under the dent.

Unfortunately, I can not stay very long, but I will answer some questions in certain periods. I wish you all a good evening.

you know. Because the number is too much, but I hope you will understand if you answer some of them
About Iran; from the beginning we wanted it to be solved by diplomatic means and we voiced it on every platform. It was a big step.
I believe it will be appreciated by the international community. Undoubtedly this is the first step. We will continue to work as Turkey.
The last book I read; Professor Dr. "A Brief History of the Late Ottoman Empire" by Şükrü Hanioğlu,
On the nuclear power plant; If we think that Turkey is a country that is dependent on energy, we can not consider not using nuclear energy.
Regarding traffic; everybody will get the least attention if they rule out without exception.
Twitter account; I have opened it so that you can follow your thoughts and ideas more closely and share your opinions with you.
I thank you so much for now.

In the afternoon, we convened the Foot - and - mouth Defense Headquarters and decided to newly vaccinate cattle and pigs on the premise of slaughter, carry out management support, veterinarians and increase the number of SDF units. We will carry out strong countermeasures.

Today, I got a telephone conference with President Lee Myung-bak of Korea and received a report on the progress situation of the survey on Korean patrol boat sinking incidents. I have told you that I am sorry for the victims and their families and I support Korea.

Good evening. Today I have a lot of questions again. I want to share my feelings and thoughts on some more topics on Twitter.
You can submit your questions by using "Write to the President" on our official website.
I read the comments you wrote on various topics to the extent possible. I thank you all.
Unfortunately, no survivors have survived the disaster in Zonguldak. I was very sorry. I wish mercy to our workers and condolence to their families.
I follow closely our citizens who are in Afghanistan for humanitarian aid. I hope they are found right.
I also want to express condolences to the grieving family of Allah for the police officer who was a martyr in Istanbul after a gunfight.
I am also following the issue of our four young citizens who have disappeared in Marmara. I hope we get good news.
I was pleased that Izzet Sahin, our citizen kept in custody in Israel, was released. The subject was followed closely and the result was taken.
I would like to thank them for following me on Twitter. I do not want to break anyone. I can not follow for now.
